synopsis.text: This high school student, Junta, finds himself in a whirlwind of chaos as he is thrust into a mission to maintain his Mega-Playboy persona. When his great-granddaughter, Lulara, arrives from the future, she is determined to ensure Junta remains the Mega-Playboy to secure her own existence. Accompanied by a mysterious old man named Mori, who harbors his own hidden agenda, Lulara sets out to achieve her goal. As Junta faces increasing threats, he is forced to embrace his Mega-Playboy identity to safeguard his loved ones. Meanwhile, Karin, who had initially believed that Junta's transformation would never recur, finds herself back in the fray, grappling with her own emotions and alcohol-induced escapades. With the future hanging in the balance and unknown dangers lurking, Junta must navigate this tumultuous journey to protect his DNA and those he cares about.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
